name: DrPepe.ai
description: DrPepe.ai is an unhinged AI meme on Solana that has cracked the code to living forever. Powered by an AI-driven Smart Agent and a vast, peer-reviewed database focused on longevity research, users can query DrPepe.ai for insights on achieving immortality. Unlike traditional AI models, DrPepe.ai addresses biases through a fully transparent and censorship-resistant system. Its decentralized structure safeguards against manipulation and state-level interference, providing a distinct advantage in both the AI and crypto space.
